Desc.entry: Provides comprehensive laser treatment for both private and NHS patients aged 16 years and above. Treatment covers a range of conditions including: tattoo removal, warts and verrucae, stretch marks, ephilde, spider naevi, acne scars, lentigo, haemangiomas, excess hair, telangiectasia, caf√© au lait marks and port wine stains. Also offers a full cosmetic service including botox, collagen and hydrafill. For NHS patients funding will be applied for on an ECR basis and will be subject to approval by the Health Authority. Private patients should contact the clinic directly. Please telephone for up-to-date details of charges. Treatments are carried out by NHS consultant plastic surgeons and dermatologists, nurses and a laser practitioner. Holds regular open evenings.
